com.mongodb.codecs

Class CollectibleDBObjectCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.codecs.DBObjectCodec
      • com.mongodb.codecs.CollectibleDBObjectCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mongodb.Codec<DBObject>, org.mongodb.CollectibleCodec<DBObject>, org.mongodb.Decoder<DBObject>, org.mongodb.Encoder<DBObject>

    public class CollectibleDBObjectCodec
extends DBObjectCodec
implements org.mongodb.CollectibleCodec<DBObject>
    Codec for documents that go in collections, and therefore have an _id. Ensures that the _id field is written first.
